inputsClass.name: isRoot
inputsClass.rawdescription: Determines whether the navigator node is a root node (top node in the hierarchy).
inputsClass.description: Determines whether the navigator node is a root node (top node in the hierarchy).

outputsClass.name: nodeClick
outputsClass.rawdescription:
Event emitter responsible for broadcasting one of the following events: "icon", "expander" or "link" as string value.

The type of event depends on where you click on the navigator node:
* clicking the icon will broadcast the event "icon",
* clicking the expander will broadcast the event "expander",
* clicking the label will broadcast the event "link".

propertiesClass.name: isActive$
propertiesClass.description: A observable which emits, as soon as the active state of the node changes.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: A observable which emits, as soon as the active state of the node changes.

propertiesClass.name: nodeInit$
propertiesClass.description: A subject that is triggered as soon as the navigator node is initialized.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: A subject that is triggered as soon as the navigator node is initialized.

methodsClass.name: expandCollapse
methodsClass.rawdescription: Expands or collapses the navigator node and its children recursively.
